mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(user_id, email, password, name, nickname, enabled) values(0, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, 0)
mapper.select: select user_id, email, password, name, nickname, enabled, profile_url from user_tb where email = #{email}

select case when ( select count(*) from user_tb where email = #{email} ) as emailCount = 1, then "email"
when ( select count(*) from user_tb where nickname = #{nickname} ) as nicknameCount then "nickname"
else null end as result
mapper.update: update user_tb set enabled = 1 where email = #{email}
